pages.text: Captorhinus is a reptile that lived during the Permian period that possessed a long tail and a hooked snout. It may have been able to detach its tail when threatened, like modern skinks.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Moss Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
